title: [UPCOMING CLIENT] Will it include moveable r/m pages?
body:
We've asked to be able to reorder rune and mastery pages for years now, and I assume it was unbelievably hard to do due to the old Adobe Air client.
Will this new, flexible one be any better?
... please?...

replies.body: Yeah, it bothers me that my accidental bad organization ended up making my head hurt every time I looked at my pages.

i really hope so , i have OCD and my adc page is number one before my ap vs ap mid ap vs ad mid ect ect , and it rly pisses me off but im not redoing 15 rune pages when riot can literally make it like tabs and i'm able to move them.
I don't think you have OCD. It's just a matter of pages being unfindable since they're not in any logic order.

Humans have a natural desire for order, and anything that goes against our sense of order is inherently upsetting to us. Some people like their shoelaces a certain way, others have a set routine, and so on.
There's a reason that people are bothered by the runes/mastery pages being as they are, and it's more than just inconvenience. That reason is the body of my previous post.
Ok, I guess it makes slightly more sense now.

Re-making rune pages isn't that long...

Just write ur stuff in notepad and it'll take like 5 minutes
Yes but why. And no, it's long.
